title: Jumpcut helps Hollywood find the next big script with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Jumpcut helps Hollywood find the next big script with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Jumpcut uses Claude 3 Opus to save Hollywood studios, agencies, and production companies hundreds of hours on script reviews by generating comprehensive reports that help entertainment teams review more scripts and more writers catch their big break.
